title: Karcist Hedvig Nussbaum
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:flopstyle-dark]]

[[module CSS]]
:root{
--accentColor: hsl(43, 100%, 56%);
--accentColorLite: hsla(43, 100%, 66%, .5);
--hue: 43deg;
--lgurl: url(https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/her-golden-wings/image.png);
--header-title: "AMONI-RAM";
--header-subtitle: "The Golden City of the Mekhanite Empire";
}
[[/module]]

[[div class="meta-title"]]
Karcist Hedvig Nussbaum
[[/div]]

[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

[[=image Karcist_Hedvig.png]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[...] Foundation field agents, while tasked with the retrieval of an unrelated SCP object, have spotted the humanoid entity pictured above. The entity was determined to bear a resemblance to Dr. Hedvig Nussbaum (also known as Saint Hedvig), who was presumed MIA both by Mekhanite forces and by the Foundation following the events of [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/rounderhouse-jade-proposal#ACT4 May 25th, 2003]. Field agents have attempted to apprehend the subject, who fled immediately. Current whereabouts are unknown.
@@ @@
Subject has undergone various changes since the time it was last seen. Most notably, [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/rounderhouse-gold-proposal the Fuladh augments on its body] were replaced with flesh growths of varying nature. 
@@ @@
The significance of this is yet to be determined. 
[[/div]]
